name: Rocket Ball Super Car Soccer League Full
name_original: Rocket Ball Super Car Soccer League Full
description:
The time of ultimate destruction has come! Start the engine of your smashing machine, the Championship of Rocket Ball Super Car Soccer League begins!
Get in your favorite car and go out on the soccer field like a rocket to hit the ball – but there is no real balls, only other cars! Crash, smash, squish, destroy, burn, annihilate – use all ways of destruction to bring chaos and death on this soccer field!
Fight with other racers on the football field, make goals, blast opponents and have fun! Drive fast and crush enemy players with spikes on your bumper! Earn points for each successful ride (and for each destroyed opponent) upgrade or repair your car! Also, you can use earned points to buy a new car – ever powerful and mighty monster truck!
Participate in the most fantastic soccer matches of armored vehicles you’ve ever seen and become the best car destruction football player ever! Can you beat a monster truck with a go-kart? Explore racing stadiums in different missions to get rewards!
Be the best car soccer player ever and join Rocket Ball Super Car Soccer League right now!
Rocket Ball Super Car Soccer League features:
Unique combination of car racing and football game
Ability crashm smash and annihilate any car on the field
Varies vehicles and different drivers – check it all!
Wide range of upgrades and deadly weapons for your car
Simple and intuitive controls
Do your like soccer or car crash games? Welcome to the Rocket Ball Super Car Soccer League – game, where you use your mighty sports car instead of a soccer ball!
